footer.subscribe_description: Join {count}+ other members and get updates straight to your inbox.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: {siteName} is a community driven list of tools and resources for developers.

meta.title: Advertise
meta.description: Promote your business or software on {siteName} and reach a wide audience of software enthusiasts.

cta.title: Need a custom partnership?
cta.description: Tell us more about your company and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

meta.title: Thank you for your payment!
meta.description: Please complete your advertisement setup by providing your company details.

meta.title: Add a free listing
meta.description: Listing on {siteName} is a great way to get more exposure for your tool. We only list high-quality tools that are useful for directory owners.

form.newsletter_label: I'd like to receive free email updates

meta.title: Boost {name}'s Visibility
meta.description: You can upgrade {name}'s listing on {siteName} to benefit from a featured badge, a prominent placement, and a do-follow link.

meta.title: Choose a plan for {name}
meta.description: Maximize {name}'s impact from day one. Select a package that suits your goals - from free listing to premium features.

meta.title: Thank you for your payment!
meta.description: We've received your payment. {name} should be featured on {siteName} shortly.

meta.title: Thank you for submitting {name}!
meta.description: We'll review {name}'s submission and publish it on {siteName} soon.

meta.title: Browse Categories
meta.description: Browse all tool categories to find the perfect software for your needs.

meta.title: Blog
meta.description: A collection of useful articles for developers and software enthusiasts. Learn about the latest trends and technologies in the community.

meta.title: Sign In
meta.description: Get access to the dashboard and manage your submitted tools.

meta.title: Check your inbox
meta.description: Check your inbox to sign in to {siteName}.

verify.description: We've sent you a magic link to {email}. Please click the link to confirm your address.
verify.no_email: No email in your inbox? Check your spam folder or <link>try a different email address</link>.

meta.title: 404 Not Found
meta.description: We're sorry, but the page {pathname} could not be found. You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.

meta.title: Something went wrong!
meta.description: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support at {email}.

feedback_widget.question: What can we do to improve {siteName}?

sign_in.title: Sign In
sign_in.description: Get access to the dashboard and manage your submitted tools.

actions.promote_tooltip: Promote this tool to get more visibility
actions.claim_tooltip: Claim this tool to get a verified badge
actions.embed_tooltip: Embed this tool on your website

claim.title: Claim {toolName}
claim.otp_sent: OTP code sent to your email
claim.intro: To claim this listing, you need to verify the ownership of the {domain} domain. This helps us to ensure that you represent the organization.
claim.benefits_title: By claiming this tool, it will get a verified badge and you'll be able to:
claim.verification_intro: We've sent a verification code to {email}. Enter the code below to complete the verification process.
claim.email_domain_error: Email must match the website domain ({domain})

report.title: Report {toolName}
report.success_message: Thank you for your report. We'll take a look at it shortly.
report.question: What is happening with this tool?
report.message_placeholder: Provide additional details about the issue...

embed.title: Embed the {toolName} badge
embed.description: Use the following badge to showcase your tool on your website or documentation.

ads.discount_tooltip: Discount applied based on the order value. Max {discount}% off.
ads.select_dates_error: Please select dates for at least one ad type

empty_states.no_tools: No tools found for the given filters.

featured_tools.title: Featured projects
featured_tools.description: {siteName} is made possible by the following supporters:

feature_nudge.message: {name} has already been published on {siteName}. If you want, you can feature it for extra exposure.
